    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message deliverMessage(Message message)
      This API is the callback for the network to deliver a message to a raft node, all the message packet will eventually be delivered to target node from the sender if you call sendMessage() method of TransportLib.
      GetStateReply getState()
      This API is to return the current node status required in GetStateReply class, the testing framework may call this function at any time to check this node's status.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      StartReply start(int command)
      This API is to start an agreement on a new log entry.

    • Method Detail

      • deliverMessage

        public Message deliverMessage(Message message)
        Description copied from interface: MessageHandling
        This API is the callback for the network to deliver a message to a raft node, all the message packet will eventually be delivered to target node from the sender if you call sendMessage() method of TransportLib.
        Specified by:
        deliverMessage in interface MessageHandling
        Parameters:
        message - the message this node receives.
        Returns:
        the respond message packet.

      • getState

        public GetStateReply getState()
        Description copied from interface: MessageHandling
        This API is to return the current node status required in GetStateReply class, the testing framework may call this function at any time to check this node's status. Read the document of GetStateReply class for all the information that you need to provide.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface MessageHandling
        Returns:
        the node status packet.
